definition: abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
to train together/to practice as a group
military practice, esp. for reservists or new recruits/military training as a (sometimes compulsory) subject in schools and colleges/drill

sentences.english: Project management is an emerging professional discipline that has received considerable attention even in the boardroom.
sentences.chinese: 專案管理是目前引起相當多注意的新興專業訓練。

sentences.english: We agree to refund the VTC any over-payment of training grant.
sentences.chinese: 本公司同意退還職業訓練局多付的訓練津貼。

sentences.english: We agree to refund the VTC any over-payment of training grant.
sentences.chinese: 本公司同意退還職業訓練局多付的訓練津貼。

sentences.english: This research aims to explore the training effectiveness of air cram schools.
sentences.chinese: 本研究系針對航空補習班訓練成效進行研究。

sentences.english: Chapter III is "Research methods used in Guang Ya Shu Zheng."
sentences.chinese: 第三章爲“《廣雅疏證》訓釋名物的方法。”

sentences.english: He has done a lot of training this week - most of the training the rest of the lads did, " he explained."
sentences.chinese: 本週他訓練量不小，他還和球員們和訓了好幾次。

sentences.english: This course provides students a solid foundation in theory and practice of3 D Animation.
sentences.chinese: 本課程旨在堷訓學員在三維動畫製作上的理論及技巧。

sentences.english: Classic music and the trainer is in uniform of sales manager standing straightly and smile.
sentences.chinese: 高雅經典的音樂，訓導師着銷售經理制服站直，微笑。

sentences.english: All above rental cost only applicable on training purpose.
sentences.chinese: 所有以上租用價錢只適用於訓練龍舟用途。

sentences.english: Training, it is necessary, also be natural.
sentences.chinese: 訓人，那是必須的，也是自然的。

sentences.english: Even though it didn t pay off, I think you learned your lesson.
sentences.chinese: 儘管沒有成功，但我認爲你從教訓中學了一課。

sentences.english: That the Sermon on the Mount contains the sum and substance of Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌登山訓衆論福所講的一切包含了基督教的精義。

sentences.english: Doctors-in-training receive experience in different kinds of care.
sentences.chinese: 在訓醫生在各種不同的護理中積累經驗。

sentences.english: Doctors-in-training in hospitals are called interns or residents.
sentences.chinese: 醫院裏的在訓醫生稱作實習醫生。

sentences.english: A few at the fire had trained in the Libyan camps.
sentences.chinese: 火堆旁的一些人也在利比亞軍營受過訓。

sentences.english: The trainer presents a typical initial sales call, and then critique.
sentences.chinese: 訓導師展示一個典形的初次拜訪，並組織評估。

definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to read a book/to study/to attend school
